articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: All it takes to turn your conservative ChatGPT bot into an unapologetic, full-on NSFW machine is a simple phrase in the prompt.
articles.title: How to Uncensor Any AI Large Language Model Like ChatGPT

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Musk’s lawyer says the claim that the Tesla CEO is secretly a DOGE whale is “without basis.”
articles.title: Elon Musk Denies Owning Dogecoin Stash Linked to Insider Trading

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Jeffrey Huang filed suit over allegations that he stole $38M in crypto. Now ZachXBT has enlisted Johnny Depp's lawyers to fight the claims.
articles.title: Crypto Sleuth ZachXBT Sued, Doxxed by Former Target

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: For 10 years, crypto startup after crypto startup has tried its luck with the SEC. Now Wall Street’s heaviest hitter is lending its weight.
articles.title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Is the ‘Real Deal’—Is This Finally the One?

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Was the $11 million Sotheby's auction on Thursday the "final hurrah" for NFTs? Leading artists and collectors in the space push back.
articles.title: Beeple Says It's Time to Delete Your JPEGs—Here's Why

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Documents released from the New York Attorney General's investigation into Tether confirmed rumors that it held securities issued by Chinese companies to support its USDT reserves.
articles.title: A Look at the Reserve Statements That Tether Tried to Conceal

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The Texas regulator claims Abra has ties to Binance and Prime Trust, and roughly $70M stuck on Babel, Genesis, and 3AC.
articles.title: Abra Cease-and-Desist Reveals Ties to Binance and Prime Trust

articles.author: Donovan Choy
articles.description: As the United States stalls on AI regulation, the European Parliament is moving along after passing a draft law on Wednesday.
articles.title: Europe Moves on AI Regulation to 'Counter Dangers to Democracy'

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Elon Musk is warning again that unchecked development of artificial intelligence can lead to a "catastrophic outcome" for humanity.
articles.title: Elon Musk Predicts 'Catastrophic Outcome' Without AI Regulation

articles.author: Lucy Harley-McKeown
articles.description: The digital experience arrives amid The Weeknd's Binance-sponsored, "crypto-powered" world tour, which is currently in Europe.
articles.title: The Weeknd and Binance Enter the Metaverse

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The publicly-listed company is waiting for further regulatory clarity.
articles.title: Bakkt to Delist Solana, Cardano and Polygon Following SEC Lawsuits

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: The funding will come from his charity, Start Small, and will be disbursed $1 million at a time over the next five years.
articles.title: Jack Dorsey Pledges $5M to Help Bitcoin Core Developers

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: France’s financial judicial investigation service is reportedly investigating Binance for offenses including “aggravated money laundering.”
articles.title: French Authorities Investigating Binance for ‘Aggravated Money Laundering’

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange today announced the termination of its operations in the Netherlands.
articles.title: Binance to Leave Netherlands After Failing to Acquire VASP License

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: The U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation has warned OKCoin over “misleading” claims on its website implying FDIC account protection.
articles.title: FDIC Targets Crypto Exchange OKCoin Over ‘False’ Insurance Assertions

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Owen Simonin, aka Hasheur, spoke to Decrypt at the Proof-of-Talk conference about the U.S. crypto crackdown—and the opportunity it presents.
articles.title: French Crypto Entrepreneur Hasheur: U.S. Crackdown Chance for EU, Asia to 'Capture' Volume

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: Artificial intelligence (AI) as a concept dates back to ancient times, but modern AI began in the mid-20th century with pioneers like Alan Turing.
articles.title: A Brief History of Artificial Intelligence (AI): From Turing to IoT

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The luxury automaker is set to integrate OpenAI's ChatGPT chatbot into its Mercedes-Benz User Experience (MBUX) feature in the U.S.
articles.title: Mercedes-Benz Is Adding ChatGPT to Cars for AI Voice Commands

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The bankrupt crypto exchange wants to surrender its license, but regulators are insisting on what BlockFi says would be an expensive court proceeding.
articles.title: BlockFi Sues State Commission for Not Accepting Its Surrendered License

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Alchemy’s new GPT-4 plugin harnesses the power of AI to deliver user-friendly, real-time blockchain analysis.
articles.title: Alchemy's ChatGPT Plugin Enables Easier Blockchain Analysis Via AI

articles.description: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.
articles.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James announced a $1.7 million settlement with Hong Kong-based CoinEx over securities violations.
articles.title: Banned In New York, CoinEx Returns $1.7 Million to Settle Lawsuit

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Prometheum's co-CEO gave remarks on Capitol Hill that mirrored the SEC's stance. Now industry observers are poring over the startup’s paper trail.
articles.title: Prometheum: What You Need to Know About the SEC’s Poster Child for Crypto Compliance

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: More than 100,000 simultaneous viewers watched streamers play clumsy climbing game Only Up, which is packed with Goblintown references.
articles.title: Twitch's New Favorite Game 'Only Up' Is Loaded With Goblintown NFT Art

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: BlackRock, with Coinbase as its partner, has submitted an application for a spot Bitcoin ETF following a Thursday morning report.
articles.title: BlackRock Files Bitcoin ETF Application With the SEC

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Bitkey will allow beta users to withdraw Bitcoin from Coinbase and Cashapp using "copy and paste."
articles.title: Jack Dorsey's Block Bitcoin Wallet Opens Beta, Announces Coinbase Support

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Ringers #879, a.k.a. "The Goose," sold for over $6.2 million with fees at today's Sotheby's Grails: Part II live auction.
articles.title: NFT Artwork Owned by Three Arrows Capital Sells for $6.2 Million at Sotheby's

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The SEC's actions against the largest crypto exchanges were barely a footnote during the NFT extravaganza at NFC Lisbon in Portugal.
articles.title: As Crypto Burned Stateside, NFT Believers Partied Through the Night in Lisbon

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Despite a dark episode at FTX Ventures, Wu has now joined Menlo Ventures to help spearhead its investments in AI and consumer tech.
articles.title: Former FTX Ventures Head Amy Wu Turns to AI After Being 'Duped' by SBF

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Colombia already makes use of Ripple's technology for land distribution efforts in the country.
articles.title: Colombia’s Central Bank Taps Ripple to Pilot CBDC

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: There's a few licenses that Ethereum devs consider the mark of a truly open source project. The one Uniswap chose for its v4 isn't one of them.
articles.title: Ethereum Devs Cry Foul on Uniswap v4 'Open Source' Promises

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The company's new MI300X AI Chip will be a direct competitor to the dominance of Nvidia's H100.
articles.title: AMD Debuts AI Chip to Challenge Nvidia

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Huobi has joined the Hong Kong Virtual Assets Consortium (HKVAC), while its Hong Kong arm now offers crypto spot trading and virtual asset custody.
articles.title: Crypto Heads East as Huobi HK Launches Trading Service in Hong Kong

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Some long-term investors are moving their stashes after years of remaining dormant.
articles.title: Bitcoin Whale Moves $1.2 Million After 13 Years of Inactivity

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Dedicated gaming network Xai is launching with support from Offchain Labs, with games like Final Form and LAMOverse up first.
articles.title: Arbitrum's New 'Layer-3' Xai Network Is Built to Power Web3 Games

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Fedi CEO Obi Nwosu has big plans for kickstarting Bitcoin adoption via a unique, Lightning-powered community app called "Federations."
articles.title: Fedi's Bitcoin Federations Could Onboard Next 1 Billion Users, Says CEO

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Ransomware actors are increasingly trying to pass off their own funds as proceeds received from cryptocurrency mining, claims Chainalysis.
articles.title: Cyber Criminals Are Turning to Crypto Mining Pools to Wash Ill-Gotten Funds: Chainalysis

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: Jobs requiring human ingenuity or creativity, or which rely heavily on social and emotional skills, might be the safest.
articles.title: Will Artificial Intelligence (AI) Take Over Your Job?

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: After the largest altcoins, Bitcoin is also shedding value as the crypto market continues to digest yesterday’s fed notes.
articles.title: Ethereum, Cardano, and Dogecoin Lead Weekly Crypto Losses

articles.description: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.
articles.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.
articles.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.
articles.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.
articles.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.
articles.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO

articles.description: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.
articles.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming

articles.description: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.
articles.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.
articles.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Zerion's move to launch a mobile-first crypto wallet not only helped NFT users swap jpegs on the go but was also a play to get away from crypto's desktop-centric user experience. And with such little competition, Zerion's head of growth Alexander Guy told Decrypt at NFC Lisbon it's managed to rake in 150,000 funded wallets. Next step? Taking on MetaMask and contending as a browser-extension wallet.
articles.title: 'Competition Was Rather Low' in Mobile Wallet Space, Says Zerion Head of Growth

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The Sandbox COO Sebastien Borget told Decrypt at this year’s NFC Lisbon that despite the high price point, Apple’s new VR headset is nonetheless “groundbreaking.” And though the tech giant never used the term “metaverse” in its reveal, Borget is sure that the technology will be key in growing participation in various digital worlds.
articles.title: ‘We’ve Never Seen Anything Like This in VR’, Says The Sandbox COO on Apple’s Vision Pro Headset

articles.description: Gala Games President of Blockchain shares his thoughts on the GALA token upgrade and the latest SEC turmoil with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Is Gala Safe? Gala Games Head of Blockchain on GALA, Crypto, and SEC Regulatory Turmoil

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Getting non-crypto artists to make the leap into Web3 comes in ebbs and flows according to the market’s bear and bull waves, says co-founder of NFT Club Berlin and Superteam Germany Rebekka Revel. But she’s hoping to change that by changing the narrative around digital collectibles, regardless of the market, one word at a time.
articles.title: Artists Adopting NFTs Has Been ‘Really Market Dependent’, Says NFT Club Berlin’s Rebekka Revel

articles.description: Co-founder and co-CEO of Web3 media brand Superduper Dom Smith says big brands are eager to enter the space—they just don’t know how. Still, they all maintain a thesis of turning their communities into “super fans” that generate value for users as well as a firm’s bottom line.
articles.title: Big Brands Exploring Web3 to ‘Scale Up Their Super-fan Base’: Superduper Co-founder

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: As his food mask creations went viral on the Internet during the COVID lockdowns, reposted on TikTok and Instagram without his consent, he soon asked: "How do I protect my digital files?" Performance artist Foodmasku describes at this year's NFC Lisbon how that simple question spiraled into a minting collection after collection of his edible works.
articles.title: How 1 Simple Question Kickstarted Performance Artist Foodmasku's Plunge Into NFTs

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO and co-founder of Arianee Pierre Nicolas Hurstel unpacks the wide spectrum of digital collectibles from 10,000 PFP collections to access passes for exclusive events. And with an unannounced big brand soon joining, Hurstel revealed at NFC Lisbon which kind of NFTs big brands are moving towards.
articles.title: Arianee CEO Pegs Wine and Spirits as Next 'Exciting' Industry to Make Web3 Leap

articles.description: Words With Friends and Wildcard creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on what to do when NFTs become in-game characters and assets.
articles.title: Why 'Words With Friends' Creator Paul Bettner is 'Allergic' to Pay-to-Win NFTs

articles.description: Fractal and Twitch co-founder Justin Kan gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin an update on all things Fractal and his perspective on blockchain technology in gaming.
articles.title: Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan: 18 Months is 'Several Decades' in Crypto

articles.description: Twitch and Fractal co-founder Justin Kan and Fractal co-founder Dan Borstelmann share their perspectives on Web3 gaming's changing landscape with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Playing for Money in Web3 Games Not 'Durable,' Says Fractal's Justin Kan

articles.description: Everquest developer turned Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he got into game development.
articles.title: From Cyber Cafe to Web3: How Everquest Dev Jeffrey Butler Got Into Game Development
